text:
What is Clawdbot (Moltbot), and why is everyone screaming about it?

Imagine an AI that doesn’t just chat with you, but actually does things for you. 

That was the viral promise of Clawdbot. Unlike ChatGPT, which stays inside a browser tab, Clawdbot lives on your computer and

Clawdbot(Moltbot)が流行っていてMac miniが売れている、という話に対してラズパイでも動くやん、みたいな議論がありますが、正解の行動は一旦その話を見なかったことにし、流行りにかこつけてMacを買い増ししてしまう、です。

結果、家にMacが3台とラズパイが1台とWindowsが1台になりました。

POV: You installed Clawdbot to optimize your startup, and now you are a galactic fugitive.

Day 1: I installed Clawdbot. I was feeling ambitious, so I gave it a single instruction: "Help me scale my one-person SaaS to a level that forces 
@elonmusk
 to acquire me."

That night, it

finally getting on the clawdbot molty train. felt like magic for like 30min. asked it a follow up question and it has pure amnesia “sorry the conversation was compacted and I don’t know the plan. can you show it to me again or tell me where to find it” what am I doing wrong? I

Exactly. Trust comes from transparency + control..... 
If ClawdBot’s actions are auditable and user-approved, it shifts from risky AI to a real productivity partner.
Due diligence > blind automation
